main event: Two witnesses reported seeing lights in the sky over Middlebury, Vermont on April 22, 1966.
interesting points: The lights ranged in color from yellow to white and red and green at different times., The object hovered for about 15 minutes before disappearing., One witness claimed to see the lights for as long as 48 minutes, while the other estimated 25 minutes., A B-52 bomber was in the area at the time, suggesting a possible explanation for the sighting., The report indicated that the lights were likely navigation lights of an aircraft.
sighted object: one round, star-like object with lights
witness description: Two college students, ages 22 and 27, from Middlebury, Vermont
